XML_PAD.Program_Language: English, Italian, 日本語, 简体中文, 繁體中文
XML_PAD.Keywords: Clipboard, Clipboard History, Clipboard Manager, Clipboard Windows 10, Clipboard macOS
XML_PAD.Char_Desc_250: Clips is a universal clipboard app that automatically saves everything you copy. You can access your history anytime, anywhere.
XML_PAD.Char_Desc_2000: Clips Clipboard is an extremely handy software that keeps your clipped data always ready-to-use. Clips comes with a visually appealing interface and supports a wide range of data including text, HTML, pictures, and even RTF files. There are many useful options: Google Drive synchronization, automatic cleanup, hotkey assignment, image editor and many more. Clips is compatible with Windows and macOS.
